help.Directions:
##Level One Goal
 Get the monkeys to the other side of the river. 
 ##Mission
 Get the humans and the monkeys across the river without the monkeys stealing anything. The boat is only big enough to hold two people at a time, and if there are more monkeys than humans on a side of the river, they steal from the humans and you lose!
 ##Functions
  `crossRiver()` - Use the boat to cross to the other side of the river.

`dropOff()` - Drop off any items that are in the boat.

`pickUp('character')` - Pick up the specified character.

##Level One Goal
 Get the human and the monkey in the boat.
 ##Mission
 Get the humans and the monkeys across the river without the monkeys stealing anything. The boat is only big enough to hold two people at a time, and if there are more monkeys than humans on a side of the river, they steal from the cops and you lose!
 ##Functions
  `crossRiver()` - Use the boat to cross to the other side of the river.

`dropOff()` - Drop off any items that are in the boat.

`pickUp('character')` - Pick up the specified character.
